*div1 type="summary"* *p*Asa Mitchell to Austin, June 18, 1826. Conduct of wreckers at mouth of the Brazos.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mouth of Brasos */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-18-1826">18th June 1826*/date_mentioned* */p* *p*Dear Sir—I think it my duty to inform you of A circumstance that took place here a few days since—*person_mentioned*Msrs- Wells*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Duncan*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* and the schooner Apalacha packet was recked on the coast *location_mentioned*about fifty miles. S. W. of this.*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr. Wells*/person_mentioned* was *person_mentioned*owner of the vessel*/person_mentioned* and him self and *person_mentioned*Duncan */person_mentioned*owners of the cargo *person_mentioned*Mr. Wells*/person_mentioned* having a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* was in haste to return, and told the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*of this place that they were welcom to the recked property if they would go after it, and after that arangement his fellow suferer *person_mentioned*Duncan */person_mentioned*concluded to stay and attend to the getting of the property and *person_mentioned*Wells */person_mentioned*then authorised *person_mentioned*Duncan */person_mentioned*to do the best he could with his property and account to him in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* for the proceads if there should be any after paying the charges of getting it to *location_mentioned*Market*/location_mentioned*, there was a vessel laying here called a chicken thief that could carry thirty odd barrels this vessel had four *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on board*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*strangers */person_mentioned*and considerable of *person_mentioned*rufeans */person_mentioned*in conduct and in appearance the[y] held there quarters at My Man*person_mentioned* Wiants*/person_mentioned* and at *person_mentioned*Mr. Bradley*/person_mentioned*s this Boat and *person_mentioned*crew */person_mentioned*has been laying here for two months after the vessel was recked *person_mentioned*Duncan */person_mentioned*tried to get them to go after the property but they could not be hired on no terms and when the Robroy arive *person_mentioned*Mr Duncan*/person_mentioned* applied to *person_mentioned*Fields */person_mentioned*and My self to assist him to get his recked property, we readily agreed and as soon as the *person_mentioned*chicken thief company*/person_mentioned* found that out they started immediately and refused to let the *person_mentioned*owner */person_mentioned*of the property go*location_mentioned* on board*/location_mentioned* with them, and when they returned with the property they refused to give the *person_mentioned*owner*/person_mentioned* any part thereof they soon herd my opinion of such conduct and they removed to *person_mentioned*Mr, Bradley*/person_mentioned*s, this conduct raised the feelings of several of the *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*who happened to be here and some of the *person_mentioned*pasengers */person_mentioned*of the Robroy and when those *person_mentioned*plunderers */person_mentioned*found the people against them they agreed to leave the affair to *person_mentioned*Men */person_mentioned*those Men declared they should give up half the property, they accordingly gave up half the property that *person_mentioned*Duncan */person_mentioned*proved to be his and refused to give up any that belonged to *person_mentioned*Wells */person_mentioned*and did not, there was six *person_mentioned*Men*/person_mentioned* concerned in this plundering business and I am sorry to say that two of them were *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*of this place Namely *person_mentioned*David Wiant*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*James Krunk*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*owner and Capt of the boat*/person_mentioned* Calls himself *person_mentioned*Arad. Sheldon*/person_mentioned* the names of the others *person_mentioned*Wm. Grooden—Ranolds*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Capt. Jonny*/person_mentioned* our two *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*appeared to be the head of the *person_mentioned*company*/person_mentioned*, I have since requested my Man *person_mentioned*Wiant */person_mentioned*to desist from such conduct or he mus leave my premicies for I could not admit of having it made a rendevouse for *person_mentioned*pirates */person_mentioned*he took the hint and has moved about *location_mentioned*three miles up the river on the west side*/location_mentioned* and there is two of the *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*yet with him for the truth of thes statements I refer you to *person_mentioned*Msrs Johnston*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Burney */person_mentioned*who ware strangers and disinterested *person_mentioned*spectators */person_mentioned*likewise *person_mentioned*Laue Ricd Kenny*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*James Frazer*/person_mentioned* and others preasent.*/p*
*p*Such conduct as this I fear will be very injurious to the carector of this place and to the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*in general for it is by Agriculture we live but it is by commerce we thrive and we ought to protect that commerce—I conclude at preasant with my cincere prayers for heaven to hasten the happy time when government will take into consideration the situation of this place and send on men clothed with the proper authority and Means of protecting the honest part of society and expelling those abandoned *person_mentioned*wretches */person_mentioned*who would suck the blood of their fellow creatures who they find in distress, insted of helping them*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Asa Mitchell*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
